headline: Killnet and AnonymousSudan DDoS attack Australian university websites, and threaten more attacks — here’s what to do about it
description: Over the past 24 hours, Cloudflare has observed HTTP DDoS attacks targeting university websites in Australia. Universities were the first of several groups publicly targeted by the pro-Russian hacker group Killnet and their affiliate AnonymousSudan, as revealed in a recent Telegram post
